data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy s7 edge, https://discord.gg/gskDSmV Android
data.actual_result: You are unable to enter the code and have to start all over again
data.expected_result: You should be able to just enter the code
data.short_description: Verify phone number window disappears when exiting the app
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server that requires phone number verification - Click on Verify Phone - Enter your phone number - Exit the app/press the home button (do not close the app entirely) - Reopen the app and notice that it is gone, if you try completing the verification again, you will get the rate limited error message.
